  • CSS

    • Position(定位)
      • static 定位
      • relative 定位
      • absolute 定位
      • sticky 定位
    • Float(浮动)
      • 浮动float

# CSS

# Position(定位)

# static 定位

.ps{ position: static;}

# relative 定位

.ps{ position: relative  ;}

# absolute 定位

.ps{ position: absolute ;}

# sticky 定位

.ps{ position: sticky ;}

# Float(浮动)

# 浮动float

.text_line{
    float:left; //左浮动
    float:right; //右浮动
    float:none; //
    float:inherit;//
}

# 清除浮动 - 使用 clear

.text_line{
    clear:left;
    clear:right;
    clear:both;
    clear:none;
    clear:inherit;
}

# flex

.box{
  display: flex;
}

# flex-direction

.box {
  flex-direction: row | row-reverse | column | column-reverse;
}

# flex-wrap

.box{
  flex-wrap: nowrap | wrap | wrap-reverse;
}

# flex-flow

.box {
  flex-flow: <flex-direction> <flex-wrap>;
}

# justify-content

.box {
  justify-content: flex-start | flex-end | center | space-between | space-around;
}

# align-items

.box {
  align-items: flex-start | flex-end | center | baseline | stretch;
}

# align-content

.box {
  align-content: flex-start | flex-end | center | space-between | space-around | stretch;
}
